title: Morgan Stanley’s Strong Quarter, Fed’s ‘Trio of Doom’, Gap in East-West Coverage
itunes:title: Morgan Stanley’s Strong Quarter, Fed’s ‘Trio of Doom’, Gap in East-West Coverage
description:
Carol is joined by Laura Keller, Bloomberg News Financial Reporter, and Ed Groshans, Senior VP and Banking Analyst at Height Capital Markets, to break down earnings from Morgan Stanley. Rich Miller, Bloomberg News Economics Reporter, explains how some former Fed heads are concerned about current policy. Hitesh Sheth, CEO of Vectra Networks, discusses the business of cybersecurity and the vulnerability of the internet. Jon Erlichman, Anchor of BNN Bloomberg's The Open, recaps Amazon Prime Day, which the company says was the biggest shopping event in its history. And we Drive to the Close with Michael Sheldon, Chief Investment Officer at RDM Financial. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Carol is joined by Laura Keller, Bloomberg News Financial Reporter, and Ed Groshans, Senior VP and Banking Analyst at Height Capital Markets, to break down earnings from Morgan Stanley. Rich Miller, Bloomberg News Economics Reporter, explains how some former Fed heads are concerned about current policy. Hitesh Sheth, CEO of Vectra Networks, discusses the business of cybersecurity and the vulnerability of the internet. Jon Erlichman, Anchor of BNN Bloomberg's The Open, recaps Amazon Prime Day, which the company says was the biggest shopping event in its history. And we Drive to the Close with Michael Sheldon, Chief Investment Officer at RDM Financial.

itunes:author: Bloomberg
